Hailey is feeling a little better each day and is rocking the eyepatch. I think this cookie called me crazy. Screenshot 4. I can‚Äôt remember what 4 was supposed to be. html:
A tiny list of things:

  1. Last week my doctor did 25 stomach biopsies on me AND DIDN‚ÄôT FIND ANY ADDITIONAL CANCER. CAN I GET A ‚ÄúHELL YEAH‚Äù?
  2. Hailey is feeling a little better each day and is rocking the eyepatch.
  3. I think this cookie called me crazy.

4. I can‚Äôt remember what 4 was supposed to be.

    Perimenopause is a cruel mistress.

    Keep on rockin‚Äô on!

    Also ‚Ä¶. I keep fortune cookies messages on my desk as positive pick me ups.

    A woman in Las Vegas wants to open a sports bar/bookstore. I told her to go for it. I hope she has a lot of money!
